content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS sapcrm.view_CLOYMEDA2
GO

CREATE VIEW sap_crm.view_CLOYMEDA2 AS
SELECT
 [0BPARTNER]
,[0BPARTNER___T]
,[0CRM_PROD]
,[0CRM_PROD___T]
,[0INFOPROV]
,[0RECORDTP]
,[ZBPARTNER]
,[ZBPARTNER___T]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_AMOUNT]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_AMOUNT_CURRENCY]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_CURRENCY]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_CURRENCY___T]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_TICKET_NUMBE]
,[BUS_GUID]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZ_ORIGIN]
,[ZZCPTIMES]
,[ZZPOINT_S]
,[ZZ_ACC_PT]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZSTATUS_CRE]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZSTATUS_PRO]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZDESCRIPTIO]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZEXTPRODID]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZMAREASON]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZMASBSTATUS]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZNTICKETDT]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZNTICKETDT1]
,[PART_GUID___T]
,[PROC_TYPE___T]
,[PROG_GUID___T]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZCPSTATUS]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZDATE1]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_ZZDATE2]
,[MEDL_GUID___T]
,[MENB_GUID]
,[MENB_GUID___T]
,[ORIGIN]
,[NO_USAGES]
,[ORIGIN___T]
,[CARD_TYPE___T]
,[CATEGORY]
,[CATEGORY___T]
,[LOYPROGID]
,[LOYPROGID___T]
,[MEDL_GUID]
,[PROG_GUID]
,[1ROWCOUNT]
,[BENE_GUID___T]
,[CAMP_CODE]
,[BNFTBGHT]
,[CAMP_CODE___T]
,[ACTIVDATE]
,[ACT_DATE]
,[BENE_GUID]
,[CARD_TYPE]
,[PART_GUID]
,[PROC_TYPE]
,[0REQTSN]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_BASIC_LVL]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_BOOKING_CLAS]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_LIFETIME_LVL]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_LOY_CAMP_ID]
,[4CLOYMEDA2_OBJECT_ID]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'sapcrm/CLOYMEDA2.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sapcrm',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS CLOYMEDA2;
